resources.string: I. I have stolen the fire for you. Can you recognize me?
„II. War. War never changes.” That’s why I am still alive.
The name of the God starts with „A”.
III. I am the best at blacksmithing! With a wounded leg I am not too fast.
IV. I am the Fahter of Gods and men, thunderstorm follows my path.
V. I am the most beautiful Goddess on the world, but I’ve made a mistake by choosing the Apple. I wish I had known Android!
The name of the Goddess starts with „A”.
VI. As a ruler of the Underworld I command the most ferocious three-headed guardian. Stop barking at me Cerberus!
VII. If you truly believe the sanctity of marriage, I – the Queen of Olympus – will guard you in your life.
She is also known as Zeus’ wife.
VIII. Trident is my favourite weapon and all of my thoughts are about the Sea.
IX. Zeus says: My son – Heracles - had a lot of tasks to gain immortality. Can you name two of them?
Steal the fire from the Titans
X. I’am watching you every time you fall asleep. „Remember: all I'm offering is the truth. Nothing more.”
I bet you will find out!
